article-meta.issue-title: Special Issue: New Directions in the Family Management Style Framework

sec.title: February 8-10, 2012
sec.p: “Stronger Together” Parents and Professionals Supporting Positive Parenting. Helping Families Change (hfcc), 14th International Conference, Glasgow, Scotland, United Kingdom. Deadline for submission of abstracts: September 9, 2011. Contact: Helping Families Change (Helen Sprakes, Event Manager, SHSCEvents, NHS National Services Scotland, Scottish Health Service Centre, Crewe Road South, Edinburg EH4 2LF; telephone: +44(0) 131 275 7751; email: abstracts@hfcc2012.co.uk; website: www.hfcc2012.co.uk).

sec.title: September 13-16, 2012
sec.p: American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy, 70th Annual Conference, Charlotte, North Carolina. Deadline for online submission of abstracts: December 21, 2011. Contact: American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy (112 South Alfred Street Alexandria, VA 22314-3061; telephone: 703-838-9808; fax: 703-838-9805; email: ccentral@aamft.org; website: www.aamft.org).

sec.title: October 5-7, 2012
sec.p: Collaborative Family Healthcare Association, 14th Annual Conference, Hyatt Regency Austin, Austin, Texas. Contact: Collaborative Family Healthcare Association (P.O. Box 23980, Rochester, NY, USA 14692-3980; email: info@CFHA.net; website: http://www.cfha.net).

sec.title: October 30-November 3, 2012
sec.p: “Families and Health,” National Council on Family Relations, 74th Annual Conference, Hyatt Regency Phoenix, Phoenix, Arizona. Online submission of abstracts due March 1, 2012 (http://www.ncfr.org/conference_info/index.asp). (1201 West River Parkway, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55454; telephone: 888-781-9331; fax: 763-781-9348; website: http://www.ncfr.org/).

sec.title: June 19-22, 2013
sec.p: “Honoring the Past, Celebrating the Future,” 11th International Family Nursing Conference, Hyatt Regency Minneapolis, Minnesota. This conference will be the official meeting of the International Family Nursing Association. Contact: International Family Nursing Association, 461 Cochran Road, Box 246, Pittsburgh, PA (telephone: 412-344-1414; fax: 412-344-0599; email: debbie@internationalfamilynursing.org; website: http://www.internationalfamilynursing.org).

sec.title: November 5-November 9, 2013
sec.p: National Council on Family Relations, 75th Annual Conference, Grand Hyatt San Antonio, Texas. Contact: National Council on Family Relations (1201 West River Parkway, Suite 200, Minneapolis, MN 55454; telephone: 888-781-9331; email: ncfr@aol.com; website: http://www.ncfr.org/).
